name: EYEYE Disposable Fountain Pens, 8 Pack Multicolor Fine Point Fountain Pens for Writing, Stainless Steel Nib, Smooth Writing for Journaling, Drafting, Sketching, Doodling & Gifts
short_description: Multicolor Set: Eyeye 8 pack of disposable fountain pens comes in assorted colors, perfect for color-coding, journaling, drawing, and artistic projects.
Fine Point Pens: The 0.5mm fine point provides precise, sharp lines, making these pens ideal for detailed writing, drafting, and sketching.
Stainless Steel Nib: Featuring a high-quality stainless steel nib for smooth, consistent ink flow and durability, ensuring a long-lasting and reliable writing experience.

Smooth-Writing Liquid Ink: Advanced liquid ink flows effortlessly for seamless writing and drawing, with quick-drying, bleed-resistant performance on most paper types. The transparent barrel allows you to easily monitor ink levels, ensuring you're always prepared and never run out unexpectedly.
Liquid Ink & Quick Drying: Enjoy a smooth writing experience with flexible, liquid ink that dries quickly to prevent smudging, making them perfect for left-handed users and fast-paced tasks

name: Luxury Metal Fountain Pen Set, 0.5 mm Fine Nib Fountain Pen with 6 Pcs 2.6mm Black Ink Cartridges Smooth Writing Pen Gift for Men Women Business Office Journaling
short_description: 【Luxury Metal Fountain Pen】 This metal fountain pen set has a luxurious and exquisite appearance, simple and elegant, suitable for business people. The surface of each fine point pen boasts a smooth texture, offering a comfortable grip. The glossy black barrel, accompanied by a gold clip, adds an attractive touch to these fountain pens. Moreover, the convenient clip on the pen tip ensures the easy portability of this black fountain pen.

【Fine Point Writing】 This fountain pen for smooth writing uses an F nib, and the writing line effect is equivalent to a gel ink pen of about 0.5 mm. The exquisite pen tip allows you to write smoothly, providing you with accurate and precise lines and allowing you to regain the joy of writing. It is very suitable for daily writing, calligraphy, sketching, and handwriting.

【With Ink Cartridges】 The writing pen set contains 1 metal fountain pen (including 1 ink converter), and 6 pieces of 2.6mm black ink cartridges. The ample supply of ink cartridges ensures convenient replacement and meets your long-term writing needs.This luxury fountain pen set includes all the essentials for pen writing, making it perfect for both beginners and seasoned pen users.

【Perfect Gift】Our calligraphy pen is the ideal writing tool for personal use or as a gift for college and university graduates, literary writers, calligraphers, journaling enthusiasts, and anyone who appreciates fine writing.

【How to Load Ink】 Simply attach the converter, insert the pen into the ink, and twist the button until the converter fills. The second method is to insert the ink cartridges directly into the pen body and apply gentle pressure until you hear a "click" sound.
product_description: "-----------------Welcome To Our Shop-----------------" Packing List: 1 x Luxury Fountain Pen 6 x 2.6 mm Ink Cartridges Specification Size: Pen: 13.7cm/5.39inch Pen Nib: 0.5mm fine point Suitable for 2.6mm ink cartridges Material: metal Color: Black

name: Pilot Kakuno Fountain Pen Madoromi Color Series, Gold (Smiley Face) Fine Nib, Perfect for Beginners and Creative Expression, Pink, PFKA-1MDPF
short_description: Durable Gold Nib: Crafted from firm stainless steel, the gold nib ensures smooth, reliable performance for modern users who apply strong writing pressure, while adding a touch of sophistication.
Ergonomic Grip: The hexagonal barrel offers a comfortable, pencil-like hold and resists rolling, while the grip naturally guides fingers into proper alignment, ideal for beginners.
Smiley Face Nib for Easy Writing: Adorned with a charming smiley face, the nib provides a clear visual cue for the correct writing orientation, helping beginners write confidently and effortlessly.

Elegant and Calming Design: Features a colorful transparent barrel paired with a refined, soothing color inspired by "tranquil moments," offering a serene aesthetic that resonates with kids and adults alike.

Versatile Ink Compatibility: Compatible with Pilot's proprietary ink cartridges or optional converters (CON-40, CON-70N, sold separately), offering flexibility and convenience for a wide range of ink choices.
product_description: The Kakuno Fountain Pen Madoromi Color Series is a delightful blend of charm, functionality, and thoughtful design, perfect for both beginners and seasoned writers. Inspired by the concept of "Madoromi," meaning "peaceful and tranquil moments or a gentle, comfortable slumber," this series exudes a refined and calming aesthetic. The colorful transparent barrel elegantly reveals the ink inside, complemented by soothing pastel hues that create a serene and inviting writing experience. Crafted with care, this award-winning fountain pen—recipient of the Good Design Award and Kids Design Award—makes writing enjoyable for all ages. Its stainless steel nib is adorned with a playful smiley face, serving as a cheerful guide to ensure proper orientation. The gold finish adds a touch of sophistication, while its firm construction accommodates modern writing styles, even for those with strong pressure. Ergonomics are at the heart of the Kakuno’s design. The hexagonal barrel mimics the familiar pencil grip, offering comfort and preventing rolling, while the smooth grip section naturally aligns the thumb, index, and middle fingers, encouraging proper hand positioning. These features make it a wonderful choice for beginners and ideal for extended writing sessions. Compatible with Pilot’s proprietary ink cartridges or optional converters (CON-40 and CON-70N, sold separately), the Kakuno Madoromi offers flexibility to suit every writer’s preferences. Whether journaling, sketching, or writing letters, this pen transforms each moment into an opportunity for creativity and relaxation. Let the Kakuno Madoromi become your cherished companion, guiding you toward the joy of writing. Type: F (Fine) Ink: Black Size: Maximum Diameter 15.2mm, Total Length 131mm Nib: Special Alloy Body and Cap: Recycled Resin Body Color: Pink Included Accessory: 1 Ink Cartridge (Black) You can also use separately sold converters: CON-40, CON-70N
